summary: a small stand-alone player home near riverwood with fast travel marker
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65163-1-1430165203.png[/img]  
this is a small house near Riverwood for those who want to start a new game.
it has a safe for your gems ...a chest for your wepons and a closet for your armor.
keep in mind if you want it to look like the pictures you sould get:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7583/?
and
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7241/?
but they're not neccessary.
this is a stand-alone mod.
even if you hated it please endorse this is my first real mod. :D
and the location is in the pictures
also you can fast travel to it from anywhere.

and if you're wondering what is the armor in that pic,it's:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7241/?

and i also recomend these mods they're graet:

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11050/?

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49032/?

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50892/?

hope you enjoy
and feel free to use and upload this mod on any where you want
just add me to the credits :)

ps. as i said this is my frist real mod so any suggestions is welcomed :)
author: Khashitk
